To use you must install Quarto CLI.

title: MobilityCorp
section: 3.5 Detailed Architecture for AI Use Cases
text:
3.5 Detailed Architecture for AI Use Cases

3.5.1 Predictive Demand & Fleet Rebalancing: An AI model to forecast demand and optimize vehicle placement.


3.5.2 Optimized Battery Management: A system to prioritize battery swaps and route maintenance staff efficiently.


3.5.3 Smart Return Verification: Using image analysis to confirm proper vehicle returns and charging connections.


3.5.4 Personalized Commuter Experience: A GenAI-powered assistant for regular users.
